1063760.name: Gnomes and Giants
1063760.description:
YOU ARE A GNOME

One of the weakest species of magical creatures that inhabit the world. You'll need to exit the safety of your cozy burrow to face the perils of the Overland. Work together with your friends to defeat the various giants that have taken over. Bring home the mana that they drop and refine it to be used in upgrades and class changes. Use anything and everything to take down the Giants and return glory to the Gnomes! 

FIGHT IN UNIQUE BATTLE ARENAS

Each boss resides in a unique battle arena - from frosty tundra to scorching lava. Slide down hills to outrun pursuers. Use your mana to place down bounce spheres that allow you to do super jumps. Pick up temporary buffs and use the terrain to your advantage to escape or even scale the giant itself!

WORK TOGETHER

Play with up to 32 gnomes. Act as bait for your friend who is busy constructing a cannon to shoot your other friend onto the giant's back. Summon a giant sunflower that replenishes stamina over time for the Warrior gnome who is trying to land a hit with his sword so that a weak spot will be created on the giant. If you die, the game isn't over for you. You could be revived at your tomb stone by a friend. Gnomes never give up!

DEFEAT THE GIANTS AND WIN?

After defeating all the giants, new game modes will be unlocked, allowing you to try to take on the giant's without the benefits of infinite lives. Should you emerge victorious even then, well...perhaps we will see the Gnome Kingdom rise again!
